sentences.english: This is my 33th birthday present from my lovely hubby.
sentences.chinese: 這是我那好好先生馬克送我的33歲生日禮物。

sentences.english: I mean, you obviously don't want 'yes' people around you.
sentences.chinese: 我是說，你應該不希望一羣好好先生圍着你。

sentences.english: I don't believe that you'll ever be able to peeve the “yes-man.”
sentences.chinese: 我不相信竟能惹惱那個“好好先生”。

sentences.english: Nice guys finish last is a saying with a lot of truth to it.
sentences.chinese: 好好先生完成最後一個是與它說了很多道理。

sentences.english: But standard yes-men are still a dime a dozen.
sentences.chinese: 不過標準的好好先生仍然不在少數。

sentences.english: The producer is a nice man.
sentences.chinese: 製作人是一名好好先生。
